summary: THE CLOCK SPRING WIRING HARNESS ON THE STEERING WHEEL FAILED AND CAUSED THE AIR BAG, HORN AND CRUISE CONTROL TO FAIL. IT IS A SAFETY ISSUE BECAUSE THE HORN AND THE DRIVER'S AIR BAG DO NOT FUNCTION.  *******DIMS 11 IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS******770791.  *AK        *JB
